meanings.definition: A person who is lazy or idle.
meanings.sent1: Tom is known as a loafers because he never helps with chores.
meanings.sent2: The loafers in the office always find ways to avoid work.
meanings.sent3: The loafers at the park spent the whole day napping on the benches.
meanings.sent4: The loafers of the group preferred to watch movies while others worked on the project.
meanings.sent5: The loafers lounged around all day, refusing to lift a finger to help.

meanings.definition: A type of casual slip-on shoe.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite loafers to the picnic for comfort.
meanings.sent2: His loafers matched perfectly with his khaki pants.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play with the shiny buckle on the loafers.
meanings.sent4: Her loafers whispered softly on the wooden floor as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The loafers felt like clouds on his feet as he strolled through the park.
